title: Sometimes League can get a bit... frustrating, to say the least.
body:
So, I left a match to help someone out. No LeaverBuster. I then go into a match right after patching the Ivern patch. (I left the match earlier BEFORE the Ivern patch. Just something to remember.) It boots me, tells me I have corrupted files when I restarted League (It told me this only after the patch, it let me login fine before it said this.)

Gives me a LeaverBuster.

I go through that LeaverBuster, no problem. Go into another game. I had lag, so I restarted to try to fix it. Wouldn't let me reconnect. Another LeaverBuster.
I start to try to get rid of THAT ONE. When I get into Champion Select, I try to ban a champion. I kept mashing my mouse to ban. It wouldn't go through, and the timer showed up that I have 10 seconds. Still wasn't letting me ban.

Internet's working fine, as it sure did kick me out without an issue when I couldn't ban, and my web browser was working just fine. Have to restart my LeaverBuster. Neat.

What I'm trying to say is - Check your internet AND your patcher before every game.  It might just be a bug with the patching and champion select.

replies.body:
In your case, it sounds like an unstable connection to the servers may be the root of all your issues. Please note that each server you access, this site, League, youtube, netflix, etc are all in different geolocations and your network route to each is different. This means it's plausible to have a connection issue to one server but not another.

As a preventative measure, I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings match what we recommend. Let me know if you have any other questions or issues with this.

So I did that. I got a game in, tried to do another..

http://image.prntscr.com/image/b8b13a0624e0402e988d26c25de9b42a.png 

The League of Legends client REALLY doesn't like me. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} 

feelsbadman

Oh, and with this one, I waited the 20 minutes, it seemed to kick me out only AFTER I wait.

It definitely seems there are likely other network issues that require us to dive into your system logs. I suggest grabbing a set using our [Hextech Toolkit](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our tech specialists can work with you further on this.
